alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Duval County through 230 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baymeadows, or near Mandarin, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Unf, Mandarin, Arlington, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Craig Field, San Pablo, Fort Caroline and Nas Jax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
